Package osyfe.graphic

Manages graphical OpenGL objects.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Framebuffer
    Represents a framebuffer.
    Framebuffer.Config
    Represents framebuffer configuration options.
    Mesh
    Manages vertex and instance data which share buffers and/or belong logically to each other (e.g. level of details of the same object).
    Mesh.DynamicBuffer
    Represents a dynamic vertex data buffer.
    Mesh.DynamicBuffer.F
    Dynamic float buffer.
    Mesh.DynamicBuffer.I
    Dynamic int buffer.
    Model
    Represents a related set of meshes.
    Model.Animation
    Represents an animation applicable for this model.
    Model.Bone
    Represents a bone of the defined skeleton.
    Model.ModelData
    Stores data of a loaded model.
    Model.ModelData.MeshData  
    OpenGL
    Represents the OpenGL context. sRGB output will be enabled.
    Rendable<T extends Rendable<?>>
    Unifies rendable objects (mesh and model) with uniform utilities.
    Shader
    Represents a shader program.
    Texture
    Represents a texture.
    Texture.Config
    Represents texture configuration options which are set when loading the texture.

Package osyfe.graphic Description

Manages graphical OpenGL objects.
Uses OpenGL, STB and JOML.
